attributes.action: reconsider the diagnose and treatment of hypothyroidism.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the diagnoses of hypothyroidism is in a very sorry state at this time. reliance
on blood tests that don`t show how the patient feels, are hampering the diagnoses
and treatment of this much misunderstood
disease.this disease is in fact autoimmune in nature,and testing is rarely done. this leads to no treatment being offered.
